Anna Kohler (nke ọzọ a na-akpọ: Anna Köhler ma ọ bụ Anna Koehler) bụ onye Germany na America na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi na onye ntụgharị
Ọ bụ ugbu a (site na Septemba 2010) Onye nkuzi dị elu na Theater Arts na Massachusetts Institute of Technology.

A mụrụ ya na Giessen, Germany, mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị (Gymnasium) n'afọ 1976, ọ zụrụ na Conservatory for Art and Drama, Mozarteum, na Salzburg (Austria) wee gụsịrị akwụkwọ Na Université de Paris VIII, Vincennes
Njikọ ya na Stuart Sherman (onye na-ese ihe) mere ka ọ gaa New York n'afọ 1982.
Dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Köhler esorowo John Jesurun, Richard Foreman, Jeff Weiss, Fiona Templeton na Georg Osterman rụọ ọrụ
Egwuregwu abalị ya na Steve Buscemi na Mark Boone Junior bụ ihe a ma ama
N'etiti ndị ọzọ, ọ pụtara na Werner Herzog's Variete na Hebbel Theater na Berlin. Anna Köhler bụ onye otu Wooster Group; ọ bụ onye otu oge niile site na 1983 ruo 1993
N'afọ 2003, ọ rụgharịrị ọrụ ya dị ka Natalya na mweghachi nke Brace Up! nke Wooster Group; a jara arụmọrụ ya mma na The New Yorker dị ka "etiti mmetụta uche" nke ihe ngosi ahụ

N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ pụtara na "Ode to the Man Who Kneels" nke Richard Maxwell. Ọrụ ihe nkiri ya gụnyere Hal Hartley's The Book of Life, Bruno de Almeida's On Run with Michael Imperioli, na ngosipụta enweghị nkwanye ùgwù na Jonathan Demme's Philadelphia, yana “Mmekọahụ na Obodo” (Nkeji 6: Mmekọahụ nzuzo.)

Dị ka onye ntụgharị, Köhler atụgharịala ọrụ site na Bekee gaa German yana site na German gaa na Bekee;  Nsụgharị ya nke Rene Pollesch's "24 Stunden sind kein Tag" (awa 24 abụghị otu ụbọchị) ka ebipụtara na Ụlọ ihe nkiri (Duke University Press)

Ọ sụgharịrị Norway.today site n'aka onye edemede egwuregwu Switzerland Igor Bauersima (nke dị site na Goethe Institut Theater Library) n'asụsụ Bekee, na ọtụtụ egwuregwu nke Richard Foreman na Richard Maxwell n'asụsụ German.
